overview: Dame Joan Sutherland, together with her husband, conductor and director Richard Bonynge, introduces operatic highlights from her extensive repertoire, including many of her greatest roles - Lucia di Lammermoor, Norma, La Fille du r+ªgiment, Lucrezia Borgia, Adriana Lecouvreur and Lakm+ª. Also featured, singing with Dame Joan, are Marilyn Horne and Luciano Pavarotti.
title: The Essential Sutherland
